headline: AI models are 'not a recipe' for high equity returns: Strategist
summary: Artificial intelligence stocks are facing bubble concerns as investors question long-term profitability. Peter Berezin, BCA Research Chief Global Strategist and Director of Research, and Patrick Moorhead, Moor Insights & Strategy Founder, CEO & Chief Analyst, discuss risks tied to high costs and commoditized tech. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Salesforce.com (CRM) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Salesforce.com (CRM) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Dragos Names Eric Cross as CRO to Drive Global Growth and Deepen Category Leadership in OT Cybersecurity
summary: HANOVER, Md., August 19, 2025--Dragos Inc., the global leader in cybersecurity for operational technology (OT) environments, today announced the appointment of Eric Cross as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO). Cross will lead all global go-to-market functions, including sales, customer success, partner and channel ecosystems, and marketing, as the company continues to deliver on its mission to safeguard industrial and critical infrastructure.

headline: Foxit Launches PDF Editor v2025.2 with Industry-First MCP Host to Enable Agentic AI
summary: Foxit, a leading provider of innovative PDF and eSignature products and services, helping knowledge workers to increase productivity and do more with documents, today announced the release of Foxit PDF Editor v2025.2. This release is a landmark update that now offers real-time communication with multiple external platforms such as Gmail, Salesforce, and Jira through its new MCP Host capability. headline: Navatar Unveils AI-Powered CRM That Meets M&A Advisors Where They Work From Outlook to Slack to CRM: Investment Banking’s First Truly Embedded Intelligence Platform For Salesforce
summary: Leveraging Salesforce’s Agentforce and Microsoft Copilot, Navatar Automates Data Entry and Turns Activity into AI-Driven IntelligenceLONDON and NEW YORK, Aug. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Navatar, the leading platform for private markets, today announced the launch of its next-generation, fully AI-powered CRM purpose-built for M&A advisory firms. The new platform combines intelligence, automation, and usability—solving one of the biggest challenges firms face when trying to put AI to work: data.

headline: Salesforce (CRM): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q1 Earnings?
summary: Salesforce’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 24.5% of its value and falling to $244.90 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
